Detailed Description

This saves the array in xls format

Example:
var = np.array([[5,10,12],[2,5,6]])
fname = '/home/tomer/data.xls'    
xls_out_file = xlswrite(fname)
xls_out_file.write(var, 'f10', 'Sheet1')
xls_out_file.save()
